text.div:
Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeFlagsDescription & Constraints
Questionnairehttp://fhir.example.com/Questionnaire/CodedQuestionnaireExample#1.0.0
meds1Medications0..*group
currmedsIs the participant taking any of the following medications?1..1choiceDefinition: MedicationStatement.medicationCodeableConcept
Value Set: Medication List Value set
hfHeart Failure0..1group
hf_hospitalizationHas the participant ever been hospitalized for heart failure?1..1choiceValue Set: Yes/No/Don't Know
hf_conditionHeart Failure condition0..1groupEnable When: hf_hospitalization = Yes (v2 Y/N Indicator#Y)
hf_condition_subjectnull0..1referenceDefinition: Condition.subject.reference
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: 'Patient/'+%patient.id
hf_condition_codenull0..1choiceDefinition: Condition.code.coding
Initial Value: Coding = SNOMED CT#84114007 "Heart failure (disorder)"
hf_condition_categorynull0..1choiceDefinition: Condition.category.coding
Initial Value: Coding = Condition Category Codes#encounter-diagnosis "Encounter Diagnosis"
hf_encounterHeart Failure encounter0..1groupEnable When: hf_hospitalization = Yes (v2 Y/N Indicator#Y)
hf_encounter_subjectnull0..1referenceDefinition: Encounter.subject.reference
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: 'Patient/'+%patient.id
hf_encounter_diagnosisnull0..1referenceDefinition: Encounter.diagnosis.condition
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: 'Condition/'+%condition.id
hf_encounter_statusnull0..1choiceDefinition: Encounter.status
Initial Value: string = finished
hf_encounter_classnull0..1choiceDefinition: Encounter.class
Initial Value: Coding = ActCode#IMP "inpatient encounter"
hf_encounter_typenull0..1choiceDefinition: Encounter.type.coding
Initial Value: Coding = Current Procedural Terminology (CPTÂ®)#99235 "Observation or inpatient hospital care for problems of moderate severity"
hfstageHeart Failure stage0..1group
aha_stageACC/AHA stage at the time of participant enrollment:1..1choiceDefinition: Observation.code.coding
Options: 4 options
aha_stage_observation_statusnull0..1choiceDefinition: Observation.status
Enable When: aha_stage exists true
Initial Value: Coding = ObservationStatus#final "Final"
aha_stage_observation_categorynull0..1choiceDefinition: Observation.category
Enable When: aha_stage exists true
Initial Value: Coding = Observation Category Codes#survey "Survey"
aha_stage_observation_effectiveDateTimenull0..1dateTimeDefinition: Observation.effectiveDateTime
Enable When: aha_stage exists true
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: today()

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for aha_stage

  • csp:Question.Option.aha_stage#1 ("Stage A: At-risk for heart failure")
  • csp:Question.Option.aha_stage#2 ("Stage B: Pre-heart failure")
  • csp:Question.Option.aha_stage#3 ("Stage C: Symptomatic heart failure")
  • csp:Question.Option.aha_stage#4 ("Stage D: Advanced heart failure")
